2140.desc: (14:57) M.Cassel pass short right to D.McCluster to KC 19 for 3 yards (J.Greer). New Orleans challenged the fumble ruling, and the play was REVERSED. M.Cassel pass short right to D.McCluster to KC 19 for 3 yards. FUMBLES, RECOVERED by NO-J.Casillas at KC 19. KC-D.McCluster was injured during the play. He is Out.  McCluster fell and appeared to injure his wrist, fumbling the ball.  New Orleans #52 J.Casillas recovered and ran into the endzone for a TOUCHDOWN.  Referee Don King ruled there was an inadvertent whistle stopping the play. The Saints were awarded possession at the spot of the recovery, first down.
